Docs.summary: Called on the main thread to abort a load in progress.

remarks.para:
Called on the main thread to abort a load in progress.
Override this method to abort the current invocation of that is running in the background on a worker thread.
This method should do nothing if has not started running or if it has already finished.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the current invocation of is being canceled.

remarks.para: Returns true if the current invocation of is being canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object LoadInBackground() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called on a worker thread to perform the actual load and to return the result of the load operation.

remarks.para:
Called on a worker thread to perform the actual load and to return the result of the load operation.
Implementations should not deliver the result directly, but should return them from this method, which will eventually end up calling on the UI thread. If implementations need to process the results on the UI thread they may override and do so there.
To support cancellation, this method should periodically check the value of and terminate when it returns true. Subclasses may also override to interrupt the load directly instead of polling .
When the load is canceled, this method may either return normally or throw . In either case, the will call to perform post-cancellation cleanup and to dispose of the result object, if any.

Docs.exception: if the load is canceled during execution.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Lang.Object OnLoadInBackground() cil managed

remarks.para:
Calls .
This method is reserved for use by the loader framework. Subclasses should override instead of this method.

Docs.exception: if the load is canceled during execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetUpdateThrottle(int64 delayMS) cil managed

Docs.summary: Set amount to throttle updates by.

remarks.para: Set amount to throttle updates by. This is the minimum time from when the last call has completed until a new load is scheduled.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
